headline: Is a Major Chainsaw Recall Revealing New Supply Chain Risks for Home Depot (HD)?
summary: Earlier this month, Home Depot issued a voluntary recall of nearly 98,000 Milwaukee Tool M18 FUEL Top Handle Chainsaws sold in the US and Canada due to reported brake safety component failures, including one injury. This large-scale product recall, prompted by safety concerns, highlights operational and reputational risks that can arise from issues in Home Depot’s supplier relationships and quality assurance processes. We'll examine how this major product recall may affect Home Depot's...
